name: Assyrian Dispersion
short: Ten northern tribes scattered across Assyria and regions eastward.

name: Babylonian Exile
short: Judah exiled to Babylon; later partial return under Cyrus.

name: Roman Dispersion
short: After the destruction of the Temple, Israelites dispersed throughout the empire.

name: African & Eastern Settlements
short: Communities of Israelites and descendants across Africa and Asia.

name: Atlantic Dispersion
short: Scattering of descendants throughout the Americas via trans-Atlantic trade.

name: Modern Global Diaspora
short: Worldwide dispersal of Israelite descendants into modern nations.
